chapter.text: Accounting for the people got close, and they turn away in negligence
No new reminder comes to them from their Master, unless they listen to it while they play (and joke around)
Their hearts are preoccupied, and those who did wrong hide the whisper (saying): is this but a human being like you, do you give in to the magic while you see (and realize)
He (the prophet) said: my Master knows the words in the skies and the earth, and He hears all and knows all
But they said: confused dreams, or he made it up, or he is a poet, so he should bring us a miracle like it was sent to the earlier (prophets)
We destroyed towns that did not believe before them, so do they believe
And We did not send (any messenger/prophet) before you except men whom We revealed to them, so ask people of the reminder (people of the book) if you do not know
And We did not make them bodies that do not eat the food, and they were they not immortals
Then We fulfilled the promise (We made) to them and saved them and anyone We wanted, and We destroyed the excessive ones
We have certainly sent down a book to you in which there is your mention/reminder, do you not understand
And We crushed many towns that were wrongdoers and We gave rise to other people after them
And when they felt Our punishment, they immediately run away from it
Do not run away, and return to what you were delighted in it and to your homes, so that you may be questioned
They said: woe to us, we were wrongdoers
And that call of them did not stop until We made them extinct as a mowed down field
And We did not create the skies and the earth and what is between them playing around
If We wanted to take a hobby, We would have taken it from what is with Us, if We were doers
No, but We throw the truth over the falsehood and it destroys it, and then it dies out. And woe to you for what you describe
And everyone in the skies and the earth belongs to Him, and those with Him are not arrogant about serving Him, and they do not get tired
They glorify (Him) night and day, and they do not slack off
Or did they take gods from the earth that they raise (the dead)
If there were gods in them (the skies and the earth) other than God, they would certainly corrupt them both. Glory to God, Master of the throne, (He is flawless) of what they describe
He is not questioned about what He does, while they are questioned
Or did they take gods other than Him? Say: bring your proof, this is the message of those with me and the message of those before me. But most of them do not know the truth and they turn away
We did not send any messenger before you unless We revealed to him that there is no god except Me, so serve Me
And they said: the beneficent took a child. He is flawless, rather they (the angels) are His honored servants
They do not get ahead of Him in the speech, and they do according to His commands
He knows what is in front of them and what is behind them, and they do not mediate except for someone He approves, and they are afraid of His awe
And if anyone of them say I am god besides Him, then We would punish him with hell, that is how We punish the wrongdoers
Or did those who disbelieved not see that the skies and the earth were joined together (as a single entity), then We separated them, and We made every living thing from the water. Do they not believe
And We placed firm mountains in the earth, that it does not shake them (as much), and We placed wide roadways in it so that they may be guided (and find their way)
And We made the skies a protecting roof, and yet they turn away from its signs
And He is the One who created the night and the day, and the sun and the moon each one floating (and moving) in an orbit
And We did not make any human being immortal before you, so if you die then would they be the immortals
Every person tastes the death, and We test you with the bad and the good as a trial, and you are returned to Us
And when those who disbelieved see you, they only take you as a joke (saying): is this the one who mentions your gods (and rejects them)? While they are disbelievers in the mention of the beneficent
The human being is created from rush (and is in a hurry by nature). I am going to show you My signs, so do not ask Me to rush
And they say: when is this promise, if you are truthful
If those who disbelieved knew of the time that they will not be able to keep the fire away from their faces and from their backs and they will not be helped (then they would not say such things)
No, but it (punishment) comes to them suddenly and stuns them and they cannot repel it and they are not given any delay
And messengers before you were certainly ridiculed, then those who laughed at them were surrounded by what they were ridiculing it (the punishment)
Say: who protects you in the night and the day from the beneficent? Yet they turn away from remembering their Master
Or do they have gods that guard/defend them against Us? They cannot help themselves and they are not accompanied (and helped) by Us

No, but We gave these and their fathers enjoyment until the life lengthened for them (and they had a long life). Do they not see that We come to the earth and reduce it from its sides? So are they the winners
Say: I only warn you with the revelation. And the deaf do not hear the call when they are warned
And if a single blow of your Master’s punishment touches them, they shall say: woe to us, indeed we were wrongdoers

And We set up the scales of justice on the resurrection day, then no person is wronged a bit, and even if it is weights of a mustard seed We bring it (into account), and We are sufficient for accounting
And We have certainly given Moses and Aaron the criterion (of good and bad) and a light and a reminder for those who control themselves
those who fear their Master in secret, and they are in awe of the hour (of resurrection)
And this (Quran) is a blessed reminder that We sent it down. So do you deny it
And We have certainly given Abraham his good sense in the past, and We knew him well
When he said to his father and his people: what are these statues that you are devoted to them
They said: we found our fathers serving them
He said: you and your fathers were certainly in obvious error
They said: did you bring us the truth or are you playing around
He said: no, but your Master is the Master of the skies and the earth, the One who created them, and I am of those who testify to that
And by God, I shall plan for your statues after you go away turning back
So he made them into small pieces except the biggest one of them, so that they may return to him
They said: who did this to our gods? Indeed he is of the wrongdoers
They said: we heard a young man mentioning them, he is called Abraham
They said: then bring him before the people’s eyes, so that they may testify
They said: Abraham, did you do this to our gods
He said: no, but this biggest of them did this, so ask them if they are speaking
So they turned to themselves and said: indeed you yourselves are the wrongdoers
Then they were turned over their heads (in shame or in defiance saying): you have certainly known that these do not speak
He said: do you serve other than God that which does not benefit you at all and it does not harm you
Ugh (yuck) to you and to what you serve other than God. Do you not understand
They said: burn him and help your gods if you are doers
We said: fire, be cool and safe for Abraham
And they intended a plot against him, so We made them the worst losers
And We saved him and Lot (and took them) to the land that We blessed it for humankind
And We gave him Isaac, and in addition Jacob, and We made all of them righteous
And We made them leaders who guide by Our command, and We revealed to them to do good and to perform the mandatory prayers and to give to the mandatory charity, and they were Our servants
And Lot, We gave him wisdom and knowledge and We saved him from the town that did the awful (things). Indeed they were bad people and disobedient
And We admitted him into Our mercy, indeed he was of the righteous
And (remember) Noah when he called out in the past, so We answered him and We saved him and his family from the great disaster
And We helped him against the people who denied Our signs. Indeed they were indeed bad people, so We drowned them all
And (remember) David and Solomon when they judged about the field that people’s sheep grazed in it during the night, and We were witnesses to their judgment

We made Solomon understand it (how to judge/rule). And We gave each one wisdom and knowledge. And We brought the mountains and the birds under David’s control, glorifying (Us). And We are doers (of it)
And We taught him making of armored coats for you in order to protect you from each others' violence (in your wars), so will you be thankful
And for Solomon (We brought under his control), the gusting wind which by his command blows to the land which We blessed it. And We are knowledgeable of everything
And some of the devils dive for him and do work beside that and We were their guardians
And Job, when he called out to his Master: indeed harm has touched me (and I am sick), and you are the most merciful of merciful ones
So We answered him, and We removed what was harming him, and We gave him his family, and like them with them (We doubled the size of his family), as a mercy from Us and a reminder to Our servants
And Ishmael and Idris (Enoch) and Zul-kifl (man of the responsibility), they were all persevering (and patient)
And We admitted them into Our mercy, indeed they were of the righteous

And (remember) Zun-nun (man of the fish/Jonah), when he left in anger, and he assumed that We will never be hard on him. Then he cried out from the darkness that there is no god except You, You are flawless, indeed I was of the wrongdoers
So We answered him and We saved him from the sadness (and misery), and that is how We save the believers
And (remember) Zachariah, when called out to his Master: my Master, do not leave me alone (without child), and you are the best of the inheritors

So We answered him, and We gave him Yahya (John the Baptist) and We set his wife right for him (so she can bear a child). Indeed they were quick in doing good, and they would call on Us with hope and in awe, and they were humble before Us
And she, who guarded her private part, then We blew from Our breath/spirit into her, and We made her and her son a sign for humankind
Indeed this is your community (of faith), a single community and I am your Master so serve Me
And they cut up their affair (in religion) between them, they all return to Us
So anyone who does from the good works and is a believer, then there is no rejection for his efforts and We are writers for him
And it is forbidden for (people of) a town that We destroyed it (to return), indeed they do not return
until when (the barrier of) Ya’juj and Ma’juj (Gog and Magog) is opened, and they rush out from every hill
And the true promise got close, then when the eyes of those who disbelieved gaze (they say): woe to us, we were definitely ignorant of this, rather we were wrongdoers
(They will be told): indeed you and what you serve other than God are fuel for hell, and you will arrive (in it)
If these were (true) gods, they would not have arrived in it, and all of you remain in it forever
They have moaning (and groaning) in it and they do not hear (anything) in it
Indeed those whom the good (reward) came from Us for them previously (due to their belief and good deeds), they are removed far from it
They do not hear its faint sound, and they remain in whatever their soul desire forever
The great terror (of hell) does not make them sad, and the angels meet them (saying): this is your day which you were promised
On a day that We roll up the sky like rolling the scroll for writing, as We began the first creation We will repeat it. A promise that is Our responsibility. Indeed We are doers (of this)
And We have certainly written in the Psalms after the reminder (Torah) that: My righteous servants will inherit the earth
Indeed there is a notification in this for people who are servants (of God)
And We only sent you as a mercy for humankind
Say: indeed it is revealed to me that your god is the One god, so are you submitters (to Him)
So if they turn away, then say: I notified you equally, and I do not know whether what you are promised is near or far
Indeed He knows the openly (and public) words and He knows what you hide
And I do not know, it may be a test for you and an enjoyment for a while
He (Muhammad) said: my Master, judge with the truth, and Our Master is the beneficent whose help is asked for about what you describe
